<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Orc Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=86) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Orc" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=124" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 59 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

In combat, you favor the brutal weapons that are traditional for your orc ancestors. You are trained with the [falchion](/Weapons.aspx?ID=18) and [greataxe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=21). In addition, you gain access to all uncommon [orc](/Traits.aspx?ID=124) weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial orc weapons are simple weapons and advanced orc weapons are martial weapons.

<title level="2">Orc Weapon Familiarity leads to...</title>
[Orc Weapon Carnage](/Feats.aspx?ID=87), [Orc Weapon Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=91)
name: Orc Weapon Familiarity
